title: Dumbledore
post_text: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.

title: Harry
post_text: I solemnly swear I am up to no good.

title: Hermoine
post_text: Just because it’s taken you three years to notice, Ron, doesn’t mean no one else has spotted I’m a girl!

title: Sirius
post_text: We’ve all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That’s who we really are.
